channel.title: Platform-Economics on >_ John Januszczak | Technology & Innovation
channel.description: Recent content in Platform-Economics on >_ John Januszczak | Technology & Innovation

item.title: Flatpeak: The Missing Layer of the Energy Transition
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Why your EV is flying blind, and how Flatpeak—founded by the architect of M-PESA—is building the ‘Stripe for Energy’ to fix it.

item.title: Moats in the Era of Vibe Coding
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: In a world where AI tools let almost anyone quickly prototype and ship software, traditional moats are eroding. This article explores 8 durable moats for the AI era and maps them to Hamilton Helmer’s 7 Powers.

item.title: Why Our "Free ERP" Failed (& Why AI Changes the Battlefield)
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: We gave Philippine SMEs a free operating system, but they didn’t use it. In this retrospective, I analyze the failure of ERPX through the lens of modern AI architecture and explain why solving the ‘Cost’ barrier wasn’t enough without solving the ‘Effort’ barrier.

item.title: AIrSpace
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Argues that AI risks driving banks toward visual and experiential sameness—‘AIrSpace’—and challenges leaders to preserve differentiation through vision, brand, and execution.

item.title: Path to Scale
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Strategies for achieving exponential growth in the fintech ecosystem.
